summary: The class orchestrates the acquisition of software packages, preferring pre‑built binaries from remote repositories and automatically falling back to local source compilation when binaries are unavailable. It coordinates downloading, extracting, handling editable or build‑specific nodes, and finalizing installation steps, including system prerequisite checks.
business_intent: Enable reliable, automated deployment of required software by transparently retrieving binaries or building them from source, reducing manual effort and ensuring all system dependencies are satisfied.
